Language.name: cs
Language.Text:
Mám hotovou analýzu stáøí Labyrintu.
Tak ukaž.
Neèekal jsem takový rozptyl, jsou tu velmi staré oblasti, mnohem starší než proteanská mìsta.
To znamená, že Labyrint tu mohl být døíve, než Proteané bojovali o svou existenci.
Jenže pak jsou tu èásti tøeba jen pár let staré.
Labyrint ještì nìkdo staví? To snad Proteané stále žijí?

Language.name: en
Language.Text:
My analysis of the Labyrinth's age is complete.
Show me.
I did not expect such a range; there are very old areas here, much older than the Protean cities.
This means that the Labyrinth could have been here earlier than the Proteans were fighting for their existence.
Then we also have some parts only a few years old.
Labyrinth is still being built? Could Proteans be possibly still alive?
